评论概述: Fabulous fit and style, yucky cheap material.
评论详情: I wanted to love this, given its memo-belly hiding stealth, but the fabric is so cheap and awful looking/feeling. It’s a weirdly thick, polyester-type fabric with a cheap sheen to it, and heat trapping qualities that negate the belly-hiding benefits for those of us “over a certain age” who may feel… hot from time to time… ahem. The style of it is great, and sizing seems on point. If it came in a different fabric i would buy twenty of them! However, given the low price point, i think i got what i paid for. If you don’t mind cheap fabric and live in Antarctica, this top will be perfect for you!

Just got my order and tried it on right away. I'm really pleased with this top! It's dressy enough for a night out or appropriate to wear to the office. The neckline isn't too deep, so it's attractive but not immodest. I am thick through the waist so the shirring helps hide that. I am 5'3", 144 pounds, 38C, and I ordered a Medium which fits perfectly. The color was true to what I saw onscreen. I got the blue green. It's entirely possible that I will be ordering this in another color as well.

I wore to a Christmas party and received many compliments. The fit is true to size and very comfortable. The fabric is soft and high-end. I highly recommend this piece. I will wear it for several years, it is timeless.

评论详情: I originally ordered an XL, but didn't like how baggy it was in the chest/underarm area, so I tried a large instead...and it fits great! The scrunching keeps the waist from looking too tight, and the upper part of the shirt fits much better now. (I suppose it must be designed for people with much larger breasts than what I've got. Fortunately, the fabric is stretchy, so I could size-down and still get away with it.)  The color is fantastic, and the fabric is very nice and feels comfortable. I can tell this is one I'm going to wear over and over...and probably need to acquire in some additional colors eventually, too!  *I'm a 39" waist, 42" hip, 41" bust, and the large fits me much better than the XL did. Base your size-choices accordingly lol!
